    • Method Detail

      • getParameterTypes

        public java.util.List<com.rapidminer.parameter.ParameterType> getParameterTypes()
        Defines learn operator parameters.

        Defines the following parameters: MLN engine parameter. Learning type parameter. Non-evidence predicate parameter. In addition, it creates optional inference parameters from OptionalParameterSpecifications.xml. These parameters are conditioned on the MLN engine parameter.

        Specified by:
        getParameterTypes in interface com.rapidminer.parameter.ParameterHandler
        Overrides:
        getParameterTypes in class MLNLearnInferOperator

      • doWork

        public void doWork()
            throws com.rapidminer.operator.OperatorException
        Learn weights from the MLN data provided through its input ports and produces example sets of the output.

        Accepts rule file, evidence file and non-evidence predicate file data in ExampleSet form on its input ports. Converts these into an MLN model. This model is then converted into an MLN file using an appropriate MLN converter for the learning engine selected in the engine parameter. This file is then provided to an MLN learning adapter along with the parameters selected on the operator.

        Overrides:
        doWork in class com.rapidminer.operator.Operator
        Throws:
        com.rapidminer.operator.OperatorException
